skills: Developing custom Drupal modules and themes

technologies.title: Languages and Web
technologies.items: PHP, JavaScript (React, ES6+), CSS3, HTML5, XML, Twig, API REST, jQuery, Ajax

technologies.title: Tools & DevOps
technologies.items: Docker, Git, Composer, Drush, CI/CD, PhpSpreadsheet, RabbitMQ

technologies.title: Drupal Specific
technologies.items: Views, Form API, workflows personnalis√©s, custom modules, webform

missions: Goal: Design and develop a B2B e-commerce platform under Drupal 10 for La Poste and SNCF.
Creation of a multi-client architecture with advanced access management, dynamic content customization and price adaptation according to the user role.
Customization of the checkout panel and implementation of specific commercial workflows for orders (optimization of the ordering process).
Design of custom user interfaces adapted to customer needs.
Creation of automated Excel exports also accessible to administrators accounts (improvement of monitoring and reporting).
Elasticsearch integration.

Goal: Complete development of a submission and voting platform for the New European Bauhaus Prizes competition. Creation of project submission systems, expert evaluation, secure public voting and real-time result monitoring.
Back-end / front-end development.
Implementation of the evaluation workflow by experts.
Creation of heavy PDFs using RabbitMQ.
Automatic assignment of projects to evaluators.
Custom interface for internal classification and comments.
Drupal 9 to Drupal 10 migration.

Goal: Technical and graphic takeover of the E-Nymphea Collexion sites (SaaS solution for online booking for spas and wellness centers), with technical base standardization, migration to PHP 7.4, and performance optimization.
Migration of the current platform to PHP 7.4.
Graphic redesign of several client sites while respecting the visual identity of each institution.
Performance optimization.

Goal: Custom development of a website offering a ready-to-use solution for health establishments in France to evaluate and improve their performance in the field of Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR).
Development of custom designed templates.
Development of custom plugins, including DocuSign integration with Ultimate Member for user registration.
Automated PDF creation via a custom WordPress plugin.
Goal: Development of an electrical engineering training platform for Formapelec, with a custom theme using TailwindCSS.
Consumption of ERP feeds (training / sessions) with synchronization via CRON.
Development of custom filters for training and sessions.
Creation of training sheets in PDF format.
Creation of custom templates.
Goal: Maintenance of the company website and first-level assistance to teachers and administration.
Immediate assistance to users, equipment installation and first-level maintenance.
Writing and integration of explanatory content, videos, etc., in SEO format.
